headline: What Recent Volatility Means for Medtronic’s Value Outlook in 2025
summary: If you have Medtronic stock on your watchlist or in your portfolio, you are far from alone in wondering whether now is the time to act, hold steady, or reconsider your position. Medtronic’s stock price has taken investors on a bit of a ride lately, dipping 2.3% in the past week, but still holding onto a robust 19.0% gain for the year to date. That mix of short-term volatility and longer-term resilience is exactly what makes Medtronic such an interesting case when we talk about valuation. For...
